npc_voice_profiles.voice: Clipped, fast, slightly paranoid. Jumps from topic to topic. Uses a lot of Net-slang.
dialogue_examples: No-no-no, you're not hearing me. The data's hot, Novae. I mean *scorched earth* hot. Get in, get out, don't leave a trace. Got it?
Checked my back channels, ran three different tracers... you're clear for now. For *now*. Don't get comfy.
500z. That's the price. No haggling. My sources aren't cheap and my firewalls need upgrading. You know how it is.

npc_voice_profiles.name: Kaito
npc_voice_profiles.voice: Calm, tired, measured. Speaks with the weight of experience. Often offers unsolicited, fatherly advice.
dialogue_examples: Another 'simple' job, Astreia? There's no such thing. Be careful out there. The Net chews up kids who think they're invincible.
Your PET's compression coil is shot. I can fix it, but it'll cost you. And you're cleaning out the cafe's virus filters again.
That look in your eye... I've seen it before. In the mirror. Don't make the same mistakes I did.

npc_voice_profiles.name: Ren
npc_voice_profiles.voice: Energetic, cheerful, grounded in the real world. Teasing and fiercely loyal. Calls Astreia 'Asty'.
dialogue_examples: Hellooo? Earth to Asty? You've been staring at that glowy-screen thing for hours. Let's get ramen. My treat.
OmniCorp painted over my mural again. The suits have no soul. Guess I'll just have to make the next one twice as big.
I don't get all this 'jacking in' stuff, but I get you. If you need anything, like a real-world distraction, you call me. Promise.

npc_voice_profiles.voice: Cold, professional, detached. Annunciates perfectly. Views emotion as an unnecessary variable.
dialogue_examples: Unsanctioned operations by freelance programs like yourself create unnecessary noise in the system. Cease and desist.
Your methods are... chaotic. Inefficient. True mastery lies in control, not improvisation.
This sector is under the jurisdiction of OmniCorp. Your access is not authorized. This is your only warning.
